title: Add ODBC support
author: mihmig
body_snippet: Is it possible to add ODBC support to handle connection list (not only MSSQL)?

iterations.description: The request does not specify whether ODBC is for connection storage, import/export, or a new protocol, so scope and acceptance criteria are missing.

notes:
AI triage (codex): The request does not specify whether ODBC is for connection storage, import/export, or a new protocol, so scope and acceptance criteria are missing.
Approach: Ask for the exact ODBC use case (provider/DSN/auth/read-write expectations), then add an ODBC connector path, wire it into options UI, and cover it with integration tests.
